h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: Although you're automatically thrown into the fox form, we'd recommend **not worrying about it until you are ready to explore the New Thunderclap Temple.** To get there, you'll need to follow the wooden paths behind the body and turn right when you see the stone figures.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Returning to Fox Form'.
The content is as follows:
Although you're automatically thrown into the fox form, we'd recommend **not worrying about it until you are ready to explore the New Thunderclap Temple.** To get there, you'll need to follow the wooden paths behind the body and turn right when you see the stone figures.
